channel.title: News 12 Long Island
channel.description: Contains short videos capturing still scenes from nature with a music background, intended for calming or meditation purposes. When you're stressed out or upset, watch a few videos. As your mind focuses on the small details, let your worries and frustrations float away. The purpose is not to entertain or to distract, but to help calm, soothe, and surface your inner quiet. The videos contain scenes from the San Tomas Aquinas trail in Santa Clara, California.

image.title: Calm Meditation
